text: int main ( ) { int rows , test_cases , i , j , k , c , t , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , d [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & test_cases ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= test_cases ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < rows ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } d [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; c = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j < rows ; j ++ ) { d [ j ] = d [ j - 1 ] + ( ( a [ j ] [ c ] > a [ j ] [ c + 1 ] ) ? a [ j ] [ c ] : a [ j ] [ c + 1 ] ) ; c = ( a [ j ] [ c ] > a [ j ] [ c + 1 ] ) ? c : ( c + 1 ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , d [ rows - 1 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
